title: mcmmo血量显示怎么关闭
author: 小熊沉塘
txt_content:
本帖最后由 声名我主宰 于 2021-2-3 01:30 编辑 

v版本: 1.5.08-SNAPSHOT
如题怎么关闭 mcmmo的血量显示

replies.txt_content:
Mob_Healthbar:
    # Enabled: Whether or not the feature is enabled at all
    # Display_Type: Per player Default display for mob health bars - HEARTS, BAR, or DISABLED
    # Display_Time: Amount of time (in seconds) to display. To display permanently, set to -1
    Enabled: false
    Display_Type: HEARTS
    Display_Time: 3


同上设置false就可以了        如果没问题请给我最佳！

replies.author: TTD_RB
replies.txt_content: 处理方案：metrics.allow：[true/false] #是否显示怪物血量
